name: Citrus Burst
descr: Awaken your senses with the invigorating scent of citrus. This refreshing soap bar will leave your skin feeling energized and revitalized.

name: Peppermint Twist
descr: Experience the cool, refreshing sensation of peppermint with this invigorating soap bar. Ideal for morning showers to awaken your senses.

name: Honey Almond
descr: Nourish your skin with the sweet and nutty fragrance of honey almond. This gentle soap bar provides hydration and leaves a delicate scent.

name: Rose Petal
descr: Elevate your bathing experience with the romantic scent of rose petals. This luxurious soap bar adds a touch of elegance to your daily routine.

name: Coconut Dream
descr: Escape to a tropical paradise with the creamy coconut fragrance of this luxurious soap bar. Enriched with moisturizing properties for soft, supple skin.

name: Lavender
descr: Indulge in the calming aroma of lavender with this gentle soap bar. Perfect for relaxing baths and soothing showers.

name: Cinnamon Spice
descr: Indulge in the cozy aroma of cinnamon spice with this comforting soap bar. Infused with exfoliating cinnamon for a gentle scrub.

name: Vanilla Bean
descr: Savor the rich and creamy fragrance of vanilla bean with this indulgent soap bar. A treat for your skin and your senses.
